entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
